data.title: They deliver.....don't go to the street front
data.text:
We ordered because a flyer under hotel door. It was surprisingly good and dirt cheap. Flyer even had 10% coupon. 

We picked up beer and ice cream across from hotel, the food got to our room before us! They said 45 minutes. Was at our door in 24 minutes! Very relaxing. 

Way way better than pizza out.

data.title: Super fast delivery to our hotel
data.text: Our last night in VA Beach we decided to be low key and eat in our hotel room while we packed.  We found this place via a menu that was left in our room.  We ordered and of course failed to realize we didn't have utensils or plates, duh.  However!  The food was 15 min earlier than they said and he brought us plates, forks and knives.  Super easy on the wallet, and really great tasting.  Would recommend.

data.title: Great family dinner at the right price
data.text: 5 of us enjoyed dinner at a great price. Combo meals were 7.25 each...you can't beat that. We ordered chicken and broccoli, general tsos chicken, orange chicken, and a couple of orders of sweet and sour chicken. No complaints from anyone. I especially enjoyed the egg rolls.

data.title: Good and reasonably priced food
data.text: Predominantly a takeaway restaurant with some seating indoors.  Beer and some other alcoholic drinks available inside and food served to tables.  Excellent quality food and reasonably priced.  Go the food, not the surroundings.

data.title: BEST EGG ROLL I'VE EVER HAD!
data.text: we only went once so we don't have a lot of experience but it was nice and clean. and the food was excellent. average amount for the combo that i ordered and my fiance got a beef lo mien. however---the two kids that run the desk/register look under age. one of them looks definitely no older than 10.

data.title: Ignore the look, food is great
data.text: We were tired and looking for a restaurant close to the hotel. The place was close very unassuming, typical inside, but the food. Freshest tastiest we have eaten in a long time. It must be popular place for a take out. We spent more time choosing than waiting for the food. Hot heaps of tasty morsels. This looks like a family affair with young boys helping and checking whether we need anything, cute! Parents can be proud. Recommending strongly. Good value excellent food.

data.title: No atmosphere, bad food.
data.text: Use this place for take out only.  Server throws a diner a fork, nothing else.  Cheap paper street vendor napkins.  No sauces on the tables.  I had the pepper steak - horrible.  We had a party of eight.  They had three cooks and there we no other diners in the restaurant.  They prepared one plate and served one person at our table.  Five minutes later, another of our party was served. One of our servers was a child of about 8 or 10 yrs.  He reached over our plates with drink refills.  Dirty hands, dirty clothes.

data.title: Take Out
data.text: The food was great.  They offer take out and believe it or not, they delivered early. Great place to eat with large portions.

data.title: Excellent!!!!
data.text: The food was excellent!! We dined in. It was so much food for the money. The Fried chicken wings and General Tsos chicken were awesome. Excellent customer Service..I will definitely go there again, and again when I vist Virginia Beach.

data.title: Good Eats
data.text:
I had delivery from this restaurant back in December. Here is my review.

The Good:

Speed of Delivery- I ordered a lot of food yet the delivery was sooner than expected.  huge plus.

Taste (Rib Tips, Chicken Wings, Chicken and Broccoli)- the items mentioned were very tasty and I would order these items from this restaurant again.

Prices- prices for the items were very cheap compared to average run of the mill Chinese places

The Bad:

The Chicken Fried Rice- while the rice was not horrible, it was dry fried rice. I had to put 3 packets of Soy Sauce on it just to bring it back to life. 

Forgotten item- I also ordered a Won Ton Soup, but the restaurant forgot to put a bag of crunchy noodles with it. 

Overall: If you enjoy Chinese food and need a decent place to order delivery from while staying at Virginia Beach, I recommend this place. FOUR STARS.

data.title: Try somewhere else
data.text: If you are looking for fresh this is not it. The only reason for 2 stars instead of 1 was the service was that the service was good. The food however is some of the worst I've had. Canned veggies and low grade meat made this meal inedible. We tossed it out and ate frozen pizza.

data.title: Good Affordable Food
data.text: The food was fresh and delicious.  Menu included sushi. Meat and seafood were plentiful in combos. Clean restaurant and open til ten.

data.title: Yummy!! Super fast delivery.
data.text: Ordered some delivery-- amazingly good and quick service. Ordered fried rice, sweet and sour chicken and General Tso's, along with some sushi. Not a lot of places can really nail sushi AND chinese food but this was great! Our hotel's front desk staff recommended it, and I'm so happy with their advice! You won't be disappointed.

data.title: Pretty good
data.text: Just went here for a quick meal as I'm staying at the hotel near by and picked up dinner. They were fast. I got the bourbon chicken combo which was pretty good but this place was just average to me. I've had better back in NY. The fried rice was not the really stuff but it tasted about the same. The only thing I loved about my meal was the crab Rangoon. This was really good. The value is good and overall it was decent.

data.title: Eat here all the time.. AMAZING
data.text: I love this place! The food is always good and cheap as well. You get really big portions even when you order a small. The staff is friendly and overall the food is amazing!

data.title: Food didnt show up
data.text: My food didnt show up. Its been more than 2 hours. Called them multiple times no one seems to be answering

data.title: Even the dogs wouldn't eat it
data.text: Ok, I admit that I am a foodie, travelling alot and eating is one of my favorite past times. I rarely leave reviews, unless the food is worth reviewing, in the positive sense, and Chinese take out is an affordable way to feed a family while getting a few members of the vegetable tribe into the kids. I never have great expectations, particularly in a crowded tourist destination, and so am rarely disappointed. This food experience however, was so monumentally bad,even the German shepherd,who thinks cat excrement a fine dining experience, turned away from it. (Ok, she wolfed down a piece of dried out sinewy thing that resembled black beef jerky) the sesame beef, but turned her nose flatly at the shrimp and scallop dish we ordered. a pitiful excuse for food. It was bad. Nauseating. I feel sick. I worried the small bite my daughter spat out would cause her ecoli worms, or worse. I'm sorry. I'm sorry for the Chinese who take pride in their cuisine, as rightfully they should. I'm sorry for the delivery guy. A nice man overly friendly and apologetic. His eyes looking away with a sad smile as he handed me the afflicted brown bag of take out. I feel especially sorry for future tourists, here on holiday with their kids. Hungry and tired after a happy day at the beach, only for it to be capitulated with spending the night hugging the great white throne. Avoid like the plague.

data.title: Pretty good overall...
data.text:
Tried their food on 6/1.  We were so tired after the beach that we decided to just order delivery...  The food came within the 35 - 45 minute time period specified.  Food was hot and it hit the spot.  We ordered:

Sweet and Sour chicken
Roast Pork w/ mixed vegetables
Fried Tofu w/ broccoli
Vegetable fried rice

Would definitely order from them again if we felt like having some decent Chinese 
take-out/delivery.

data.title: Great for take out
data.text: Fitst evening of our family vacation. We were all a bit tired from our 8 hour drive from PA. We have often heard that Chinese food just isn't as good the farther away you get from NYC and Philly. I couldn't disagree more. For being a little hole-in-the-wall restaurant the food actually was very good. We ordered numerous items from the menu as we always do. The teriyaki chicken was amazing. Bourbon chicken was excellent. The fried rice was moist and flavorful. The crab rangoons were better than ones I've had in the city. The general Tso chicken was rather generic, buffet quality. The seafood soup was more like vegetable soup broth with shrimp and crab added. The meal was very satisfying. We had no regrets. This is not a place I would want to dine at however. The place is very run down. The dining area was filthy. The owners kids were running around playing. The owner seemed to be very angry at something. But hey, for take out the price was very fair and worth it.

data.title: bad idea
data.text: I was at the Ocean Sands 2 blocks from Golden City, I placed an order for delivery (the woman told me it would be 40 minutes) and an hour and a half later my food showed up COLD!  your better off going a few blocks inland and eating at china harbor on 17th and Cypress ave!
